subjects.title: Select the subject you want to study

new.title: Create a new subject
new.subtitle: A "subject" represents a specific area of knowledge or field of study. You'll later organize more specific topics into categories. Examples of subjects are math, science, and history.

errors.min: Subject name must be at least 4 characters long
errors.max: Subject name cannot be more than 20 characters long
errors.regex: Subject name can only contain letters, numbers, and spaces

new.title: Create a new category
new.subtitle: A "Category" is a specific field inside given subject. For example, in a "Math" subject, you may create categories such as algebra, geometry and statistics.

name.min: Category name must be at least 4 characters long
name.max: Category name cannot be longer than 24 characters
name.regex: Category name cannot contain special characters

new.title: Create a new question
new.subtitle: Write a new multiple-choice question for your category. Markdown is supported for question text and options fields.

edit.title: Edit question
edit.subtitle: Edit the details of the question. Markdown is supported for question text and options fields.

text.min: Question must be at least 24 characters long
text.max: Question cannot be longer than 5000 characters

options.max: Options cannot be longer than 2500 characters

tags.max: A question cannot have more than 3 tags

custom.title: Create custom test
custom.subtitle: Select all the questions you wish to include in the test. Additionally you can filter questions by tag to make your searching easier.

random.title: Create random test
random.subtitle: Generate a test with randomly chosen questions based on the settings below.
random.selectTags: Select the tags you want to include in the test's questions (Leave blank to allow all questions, even those without any tags)

errors.max: Test name cannot be more than 64 characters long

custom.question: Please select at least one question

random.min: Please enter the number of questions your test should contain
random.noQuestions: No questions available with the selected tags
